text: Joanna Jackson (born 26 February 1970) is a British equestrian. She competed in two events at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:British female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Great Britain Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lancashire
title: Joanna Jackson (equestrian)
